t: Structured test results from per-dept Testers
mh: All 3 Tester agents (BE, FE, UX) produce structured test-results.jsonl
test-results.jsonl includes per-task breakdown with pass/fail counts
obj: Extend per-department Tester agents to produce structured test-results.jsonl with per-task test breakdowns (pass/fail counts, test files, department attribution). This supplements the existing test-plan.jsonl (RED phase) with GREEN phase structured results.

a: Update references/artifact-formats.md: Add new 'Test Results (test-results.jsonl)' section. Schema — single line per plan: {plan (string, plan ID), dept (string, 'backend'|'frontend'|'uiux'), phase (string, 'red'|'green'), tc (number, total test cases), ps (number, passed), fl (number, failed), dt (string, YYYY-MM-DD), tasks (object[], per-task breakdown: {id (string, task ID), ps (number), fl (number), tf (string[], test file paths)})}. Add to Key Dictionary: dept=department, ps=passed, fl=failed (if not already present). Add to Phase Directory Structure: test-results.jsonl committed artifact. Note: 'Written by Dev after GREEN phase confirmation. RED phase results stay in test-plan.jsonl. test-results.jsonl provides structured GREEN phase output for QA consumption. Added in Phase 4.'

Update agents/yolo-dev.md: After TDD GREEN verification in Stage 2, add test result collection step. Dev writes test-results.jsonl to phase directory after all tasks in a plan pass GREEN. Schema: {plan, dept:'backend', phase:'green', tc, ps, fl, dt, tasks:[{id, ps, fl, tf}]}. Instructions: 'After all tasks pass GREEN, run test suite and capture per-task results. Write one test-results.jsonl line per plan. Commit: docs({phase}): test results {NN-MM}'. This is separate from summary.jsonl — test-results.jsonl captures structured test metrics while summary.jsonl captures implementation metadata.

Update agents/yolo-fe-dev.md: Same test-results.jsonl output as T2 with dept:'frontend'. FE-specific test categories to track in tasks[]: component unit tests (Jest/Vitest), accessibility tests (axe-core), E2E tests (Playwright/Cypress) — each as separate task entries if applicable.

Update agents/yolo-ux-dev.md: Same test-results.jsonl output as T2 with dept:'uiux'. UX-specific test categories: design token validation tests, WCAG compliance checks, component spec conformance tests — each tracked in tasks[] breakdown.
